page.title: 06TRADE (LIMBERSEY NURSERIES)
page.content: Limbersey Nurseries is situated on Limbersey Lane, Maulden.They sell garden (bedding plants)but mainly conifers. They mainly wholesale but do sell some to the general public. They make up their own soil using sand,compost,and peat,which suits the conifers nicely. Mrs Parrot,the owner does not employ anybody, it is just Mrs Parrot and her husband To get to Limbersey Nurseries you go up the Brache (Maulden),turn left,turn right then go straight on. There is a field behind, in which they keep horses. There is an apple orchard behind the nurseries.
